#summary grepfield - looks for patterns within a specific field of a flat-file

= Usage =

`grepfield <options> <pattern> [file ...]`
if no field is specified, the entire input line is scanned.
= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||Arugment||Description||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-V||--version|| ||print version info and exit||
||-d||--delim||<delim> ||field separator string (default: 0xfe)||
||-o||--outfile||<outfile> ||output file name (default: stdout)||
||-f||--field||<field> ||index of field to scan (1-based)||
||-v||--invert|| ||print only non-matching lines||
||-i||--ignore-case|| ||do case-insensitive matches||
||-p||--preserve_header|| ||preserve the header line||
